1. Test task for OniGo:

 Create an application for Android using Kotlin, display products on the main screen using the API.

 for the list:

 https://api.onigo.club/first_store_id/cat_v2/野菜

 for pictures:

 https://static-server-a-static.pro.onigo.co.jp/onigo/

 On pressing on a product tile, should navigate to an additional screen from which it`s possible to return back.


 2. Solution:

 For API requests the Retrofit and OkHttpClient libraries were used.

 Navigation, loading state (ProgressBar) and lists (RecyclerView) are default.


 3. What can be improved:

 Configure image caching.

 Upgrade compileSdk from 33 to 34, at the same time migrate from Kotlin synthetics to Jetpack view binding.
